document.full_text: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords and her astronaut husband, capt. mark kelly, dined out with friends at a houston restaurant recently, another step in her gradual recovery from gunshot wounds, a spokesman confirmed on friday.
document.title: recovering congresswoman giffords dines out in houston
lines_and_colors: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords and her astronaut husband, capt. mark kelly, dined out with friends at a houston restaurant recently, another step in her gradual recovery from gunshot wounds, a spokesman confirmed on friday.
